text: Levent Şahin (born 20 September 1973) is a Turkish former football player, and the current assistant manager of Galatasaray. ==Playing career== Kafkas was born in Edremit. He was an amateur footballer, playing for Yeni Yolspor and Şekerbank Ankara. ==Managerial career== Levent began his managerial career as the assistant for Ankaragücü. He was the assistant coach for various teams in the lower divisions of Turkey, before gaining his first head coach experience at Bugsaşspor in 2009 for the TFF Second League. He became the coach for various youth team for the Turkish Football Federation in 2012, and then became an assistant coach for the senior Turkey national football team in 2016. in January 2017, Levent became the head coach for Adanaspor in the Süper Lig, simultaneously remaining assistant coach for the Turkish national team. He left this job on 9 April 2017.Levent Şahin istifa etti‚ ntv.com.tr, 9 April 2017 In December 2017, Levent became the assistant coach for Galatasaray.http://www.haberturk.com/levent-sahin-terim-in-yardimcisi- oldu-1767963-spor ==References== ==External links== *Levent TFF Manager profile *Leven Mackolik profile Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:People from Edremit, Balıkesir Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkish football managers Category:Süper Lig managers Category:Adanaspor managers Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
